comment.body:
there's also xmpp, tox, mumble, bitmessage, STEAM (bleh), paper airplanes, actual honest to god  phone calls, et al.
i dont understand why none of my friends want to adopt i2p bote as our primary means of communication...

People are easily offended, and it's not hard to get them to block me (I don't even have to interact with them sometimes, I just need to breathe the same air as them!). As far as I'm concerned, if they want to block me from reading what they have to say, they are making a statement that their statements are not important, insightful, or interesting enough to exist. They're usually doing me a favor by preventing me from wasting my time reading what they have to say.
thank you very much :)
this is the most kawaii thing my eyes have witnessed today
did you happen to discover the difference between an emoji and an emoticon? i was never clear on this
@Ivesen: you broke the site way to go
if a malicious agent attacks my raspberry pi then at least someone is using it instead of it just gathering dust
i didn't even have to click the blurry thumbnail to know what the actual image was
that was me, sorry about that
which mastadon instances do you plan on blacklisting or being blacklisted from?

@Acabin: that's good. that's the biggest problem mastadon has. i like federation, but too many big "sjw" instances will turn a federated network into a broken ad hoc network by blocking every instance they don't like.
good boys and girls dont anger the eldricht horror under their bed
thats probably a sign you and them need to take a break from interacting with each other for a day or two

well i don't know what got you and that person both upset. but i do know lots of people have been in kind of a bad way in the last week. it's just that time of the year, and everyone i know has been hit by it as well. if you think their behavior is out of the ordinary for them, they probably just need to cool their jets.
this is an important truth
i'm having a very difficult time not replying to this post with "thanks for letting me know about your pet peeves krixano"
@Styromaniac: i don't know if it qualifies for your nopelist since it isn't going to land anyone in jail. unless it does, i haven't opened it. doesn't sound like something i want to help seed.

@Styromaniac: i feel it is a site that deserves to be blacklisted by people. however, i also feel that subscribers to your nopelist might expect the list to be about blocking child pornographic sites. unless it's also for sites which run bitcoin miners or do other invasive js or 3rd party script loading. i don't actually use your blocklist so i guess that's up to you and your subscribers. if your reason is for the crypto miner, i should let you know there are a few other ZN sites that have crypto miners in them also.
@Styromaniac: @Astringent: i did the guy a solid and added a third entry for his site on zerosites. it points to this address: [Public Site](/1PUb1iCBuQPki3umfTtUdbmfoMeCUCH5p7/)

if you maintain this and spam continues and becomes a recurring problem, i'll probably subscribe to it. with blocklists, a very strong focus like yours is best. also i would like to comment that if pedos don't distribute cp there is no need reason for anyone to make a blocklist against them except out of spite.
when I last read Aether's tos/privacy policy it admits that Aether logs users ip addresses for their posts and I don't understand why Aether needs to do this.
you triggered me
@PolarüçÄ‚òòÔ∏èüåøüåæüå¥: sorry i didn't mean to come off as super serious. i didn't need to click the links, just the image of the machine itself was enough to tell me what it was.
@PolarüçÄ‚òòÔ∏èüåøüåæüå¥: it's well known to me, at least. it's a pretty common sight in on imageboards when someone wants to upset lots of people in a loli thread
oh! thanks! i didn't consider it to be possible for someone to access a ZN site without having .js enabled. i fixed it now so it's expanded by default and .js allows you to collapse it.

if your suicidal feelings wane soon i hope you find yourself in a position to make the most of the time to make positive changes in your life even if they're small ones. those little reinforcements make a big difference, at least for me.

please stay safe. psychosis can lead people to put themselves at great danger. schizophrenia isn't the only thing that can cause delusions or hallucinations, but if you're experiencing those symptoms, you owe it to yourself to get it checked out.

@Kaffie: i have the negative symptoms myself (but none of the "positive" ones). i mustn't go to a therapist for <reasons>. but yeah. my friend has the whole shebang and he has a tendency to wander into the woods in extreme temps and stuff like that. i worry a lot about that.
@Kids : my list of sites is starting to look like a graveyard.

very good friend of mine is also dealing with delusions and possible schizophrenia (undiagnosed...). he has good luck managing it on his own (though i wish he would discuss this with a doctor or psychologist) and i hope you similarly have good luck managing yours.
then prepare to give up your own freedoms.

@draugrdeathlord@zeroid.bit: since you clarified a little: those degenerates DO have the right to freedom of speech and i will staunchly defend it. HOWEVER, i do not consider uploading child pornography to be a valid form of speech, and do not believe they have a right to do such a thing. even if i were to believe they had some god given right to upload child pornography, i would still consider them shitheads for exercising their right in such an obnoxious and rude way that recklessly endangers the safety and well being of others.

@draugrdeathlord@zeroid.bit: i'm not really sure if i can call myself a free speech absolutist or whatever. for example, libel and slander can be considered forms of speech. but everyone agrees that harming someone's reputation by deliberately lying about them isn't protected free speech. child pornography is a huge twisted mess of its own, and there's good arguments for why possessing or viewing it should be decriminalized, but creating and distributing it is very clearly a no no. but outside of these concepts, there's very little i wouldn't defend.
@draugrdeathlord@zeroid.bit: it is absolutely a form of expression, and a human right, that i will defend with every fiber of my body.
it happens
